simpledb

Class BPlusTreeFileEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.BPlusTreeFileEncoder

  • public class BPlusTreeFileEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
    BPlusTreeFileEncoder reads a comma delimited text file and converts it to pages of binary data in the appropriate format for simpledb B+ tree pages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Comparator to sort BPlusTreeEntry objects by key

      comparator to sort Tuples by key field

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public static BPlusTreeFile convert(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> tuples,
                    java.io.File hFile,
                    java.io.File bFile,
                    int keyField,
                    int numFields)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Encode the file using the BPlusTreeFile's Insert method.
        Parameters:
        tuples - - list of tuples to add to the file
        hFile - - the file to temporarily store the data as a heap file on disk
        bFile - - the file on disk to back the resulting BPlusTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field for this B+ tree
        numFields - - the number of fields in each tuple
        Returns:
        the BPlusTreeFile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                             throws java.io.IOException
        Encode the file using the BPlusTreeFile's Insert method.

        hFile - - the file to temporarily store the data as a heap file on disk
        bFile - - the file on disk to back the resulting BPlusTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field for this B+ tree
        numFields - - the number of fields in each tuple

      • convert

        public static BPlusTreeFile convert(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> tuples,
                    java.io.File hFile,
                    java.io.File bFile,
                    int npagebytes,
                    int numFields,
                    Type[] typeAr,
                    char fieldSeparator,
                    int keyField)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    DbException,
                                    TransactionAbortedException
        Faster method to encode the B+ tree file
        Parameters:
        tuples - - list of tuples to add to the file
        hFile - - the file to temporarily store the data as a heap file on disk
        bFile - - the file on disk to back the resulting BPlusTreeFile
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        numFields - - number of fields per tuple
        typeAr - - array containing the types of the tuples
        fieldSeparator - - character separating fields in the raw data file
        keyField - - the field of the tuples the B+ tree will be keyed on
        Returns:
        the BPlusTreeFile
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • convert

        public static BPlusTreeFile convert(java.io.File inFile,
                    java.io.File hFile,
                    java.io.File bFile,
                    int npagebytes,
                    int numFields,
                    Type[] typeAr,
                    char fieldSeparator,
                    int keyField)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    DbException,
                                    TransactionAbortedException
        Faster method to encode the B+ tree file
        Parameters:
        inFile - - the file containing the raw data
        hFile - - the data file for the HeapFile to be used as an intermediate conversion step
        bFile - - the data file for the BPlusTreeFile
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        numFields - - number of fields per tuple
        typeAr - - array containing the types of the tuples
        fieldSeparator - - character separating fields in the raw data file
        keyField - - the field of the tuples the B+ tree will be keyed on
        Returns:
        the B+ tree file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException
        TransactionAbortedException

      • setRightSiblingPtrs

        private static void setRightSiblingPtrs(BPlusTreeFile bf,
                       BPlusTreePageId pid,
                       BPlusTreePageId rightSiblingId)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        DbException
        Set all the right sibling pointers by following the left sibling pointers
        Parameters:
        bf - - the BPlusTreeFile
        pid - - the id of the page to update with the right sibling pointer
        rightSiblingId - - the id of the page's right sibling
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        DbException

                               DbException

        Parameters:
        bf - - the BPlusTreeFile
        pid - - id of the page to update with the parent pointer
        parent - - the id of the page's parent

      • cleanUpEntries

        private static void cleanUpEntries(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<BPlusTreeEntry>> entries,
                  BPlusTreeFile bf,
                  int nentries,
                  int npagebytes,
                  Type keyType,
                  int tableid,
                  int keyField)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Write out any remaining entries and update the parent pointers.
        Parameters:
        entries - - the list of remaining entries
        bf - - the BPlusTreeFile
        nentries - - number of entries per page
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        keyType - - the type of the key field
        tableid - - the table id of this BPlusTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateEntries

        private static void updateEntries(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<BPlusTreeEntry>> entries,
                 BPlusTreeFile bf,
                 BPlusTreeEntry e,
                 int level,
                 int nentries,
                 int npagebytes,
                 Type keyType,
                 int tableid,
                 int keyField)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Recursive function to update the entries by adding a new Entry at a particular level
        Parameters:
        entries - - the list of entries
        bf - - the BPlusTreefile
        e - - the new entry
        level - - the level of the new entry (0 is closest to the leaf pages)
        nentries - - number of entries per page
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        keyType - - the type of the key field
        tableid - - the table id of this BPlusTreeFile
        keyField - - the index of the key field
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertToLeafPage

        public static byte[] convertToLeafPage(java.util.ArrayList<Tuple> tuples,
                       int npagebytes,
                       int numFields,
                       Type[] typeAr,
                       int keyField)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Convert a set of tuples to a byte array in the format of a BPlusTreeLeafPage
        Parameters:
        tuples - - the set of tuples
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        numFields - - number of fields in each tuple
        typeAr - - array containing the types of the tuples
        keyField - - the field of the tuples the B+ tree will be keyed on
        Returns:
        a byte array which can be passed to the BPlusTreeLeafPage constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertToInternalPage

        public static byte[] convertToInternalPage(java.util.ArrayList<BPlusTreeEntry> entries,
                           int npagebytes,
                           Type keyType,
                           int childPageCategory)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Convert a set of entries to a byte array in the format of a BPlusTreeInternalPage
        Parameters:
        entries - - the set of entries
        npagebytes - - number of bytes per page
        keyType - - the type of the key field
        childPageCategory - - the category of the child pages (either internal or leaf)
        Returns:
        a byte array which can be passed to the BPlusTreeInternalPage constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertToRootPtrPage

        public static byte[] convertToRootPtrPage(int root,
                          int rootCategory,
                          int header)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a byte array in the format of a BPlusTreeRootPtrPage
        Parameters:
        root - - the page number of the root page
        rootCategory - - the category of the root page (leaf or internal)
        header - - the page number of the first header page
        Returns:
        a byte array which can be passed to the BPlusTreeRootPtrPage constructor
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
